subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Golf
lead_paragraph: George J. Zahringer III of Deepdale Golf Club in Manhasset, N.Y., a fixture of amateur golf in the New York area for more than 30 years, won the 2007 Jerry Courville Sr. Metropolitan Golf Association Player of the Year award. It was the 10th time Zahringer won player of the year, extending his own record. Zahringer had 844 points, 209 more than Brian Komline of High Bridge Hills and 264 more than the third-place finisher, Joe Saladino of Huntington.
